description.value: As a Full Action, can make a WP Test to try to cause an Unsecured Metal Object you can see within 20 metres to fly into your hand, maximum mass of 1xWP Bonus kilograms.

system.benefit: As a Full Action, can make a WP Test to try to cause an Unsecured Metal Object you can see within 20 metres to fly into your hand, maximum mass of 1xWP Bonus kilograms.

specialAbilities.name: Attract Metal
specialAbilities.description: You can use a Half Action to attract small metal objects within 5m to your hand.
